review: I love it to pieces! It runs so much faster than my Wi-Fi-enabled Blu-ray player, and I'm so glad I can use Netflix, HuluPlus, AND Amazon Instant video. I wish there were a power-off option, though. I keep going to settings and putting it to sleep, but that's a bit of a chore. Also, if the text were a bit larger as videos are loading, that would make it easier to see the episode titles when watching TV shows. I hope this stays running quickly for a long, long time. :)
author: fishdye "Erin"

review: It worked for a few days, and then, it stopped.It would say I wasn't connected to the Internet or Wi-Fi or something.  It found my router, connection shows up as FAIR even though the router is right next to the TV.  But it also shows as disconnected.  So, it sees the router but won't connect to it.  I enter the password to the router but the Firestick never connects.  Is there a trick to this?  Why would it work one day, and stop working the next?Usually happy with Amazon offerings, whether it's cables or some other Amazon brand item.  When it worked, this item was okay.  Easy setup, easy interface, and served it's purpose of watching Amazon Prime offerings.  But then it stopped.  Very disappointed, Amazon.
